text:
December 21, 195&
Mr. H. S. Renne
Technical Editor
Radio-Electronic Engineering
366 Madison Avenue
New York 17, N. Y.
Dear Mr. Rennet
Thank you for your letter of December 13 concerning the article on
FM multiplexing which appeared in Coramunication Engineering.
I have written Mr. Crosby and before your letter arrived, he sent me
a reprint of the article which I wanted so I will not need the photostats
you mentioned in your letter.
Yours very truly.
GSB:cp
Cecil S. Bidlack
Television Engineer
